title: Anyone had a spare Graphics card- -
body: Hi guys dose anyone have a spare graphics card and lives in WA PERTH please contace me, I fcked mine up and yea welp.

replies.body:
You do realise that a graphics card is usually what makes the majority of the cost of a computer?

[Here's a website that I think has national shipping were you can buy graphics cards off of.](http://www.itestate.com.au/pages/product/pdt_subCategory_tree.faces?BeanName=subCategoryTreeAction&subCode=00005&type=2) This is just one of the many stores and places you could go to seek such things.
